::Zardus/DevilDuer/Annihilator/Killer/Zeus/Ares::

Zardus steps out of a CR chamber, heading for the bridge when Scattershot's 
transmission reaches his comm-link. Zardus blinks. That was strange.

"Umm, Zardus," his comm-link comes alive with DevilDuer's voice, "I'd just 
like to say that Scattershot cracked. I'm perfectly fine."

Zardus nods. "Uh uh..." he says into his comm-link, "Both of you return to 
base."

With that he reaches the bridge, seeing a stasis pod (Oinker) on the 
scanners. Zardus grins. How nice of the new bot to arrive, right when troops 
were usefull.

Zardus flies out of the base, heading for Oinker's position.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
DevilDuer looks at Scattershot.

"You heard 'im. Let's get back to base and have your head checked."
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Annihilator spins around in his chair, the scanners reporting something. 
"Shuko, the scanners are reporting that alot of the predacons have left their 
base. I suggest we crush them now!"

Killer also turns in his chair. "Yeah! We could crush those fools when they 
are out on buisness. Let's move now."

Ares and Zeus, who were passing through, turn to Shuko. "Those two are 
right," Zeus says, "Let's go kick their inferior skid plates."
